resources.string: Mukhoza kusintha seva yanu yowonjezera kenako mu Maimidwe (Deta ndi Kusungirako).
Lembani kuti mulembe vidiyo. Dinani kuti musinthe ku audio.
Eya, tiyeni tipite ku Telangram Messenger: http://goo.gl/jnmjnZ
Mamembala onse akhoza kuwonjezera mamembala atsopano, kusintha dzina ndi chithunzi cha gululo.
Malangizo ayenera kukhala osiyana ndi mawu anu achinsinsi
Pepani, simungathe kuwonjezera munthu uyu pazitsulo chifukwa cha kusungulumwa kwa wosuta.
Telegalamu ikufuna kupeza malo osungirako kuti mutumize ndi kusunga zithunzi, mavidiyo, nyimbo ndi zina.

Chonde sankhani chiyanjano cha kanema yanu, kuti anthu athe kuzipeza ndikufufuza ndi kugawana ndi ena.
Ngati inu simukufuna, timapanga kupanga kanema wapadera mmalo mwake.
Palibe zochita zopezeka Palibe zochitika zatsopano zomwe zikugwirizana ndi funso lanu apezeka.

Tidzatumiza SMS ndi ndondomeko yotsimikizira ku nambala yanu yatsopano.
Mwawathandiza kutsimikizira kawiri-magawo. You \'ll ifunika mawu osungira omwe mwakhazikitsa apa kuti mulowe ku akaunti yanu ya Telegram.
Mukhoza kulepheretsa omwe angakuwonjezereni ku magulu ndi njira zowonongeka.
Ogwiritsa ntchito awa sadzatha kukuwonjezerani ku magulu ndi makanema mosasamala zoyikidwa pamwambapa.
Telangram Messenger amapereka mauthenga mofulumira kuposa any ntchito zina.

Mukhoza kusunga mfundo zanu zolipira kuti mugwiritse ntchito mtsogolo.

%1$s ikugwiritsira ntchito TV yakale, kotero zithunzi zachinsinsi zidzawonetsedwa mogwirizana.
Once%2$s ikuwongolera Telegram, zithunzi ndi timeri kwa mphindi imodzi kapena zochepa ziyamba kugwira ntchito \'Tapani ndikugwira kuti muwone \'mode, ndipo mudzadziwitsidwa ngati wina aliyense atenga chithunzi.
Kuti muyanjanitse momasuka ndi aliyense amene mumadziŵa, lolani Telegram kupeza kwa anu ocheza nawo.
Maina a Channel sangayambe ndi nambala.
Yonjezerani mayina a amavoni ku mauthenga omwe amalemba.
Palibe zochita zam\'mbuyo zomwe zili ndi \'%1$s \' zapezeka.

M\'magulu akuluakulu • Mamembala atsopano angathe kuona mbiri yonse ya mbiri • Mauthenga atachotsedwa adzatha kwa mamembala onse • Amadzimadzi amatha kufalitsa mauthenga ofunika kwambiri • Mlengi akhoza kukhazikitsa chiyanjano cha pagulu

Kuyeretsa deta yamtunduwu kumachotsa malemba omwe amalembedwa ndi kupondereza deta kuti muteteze mkati mwa disk space. Telegalamu imafuna deta kuti igwire ntchito, kotero kukula kwa deta sikudzafike pazero.
Tchitoyi ikhoza kutenga maminiti angapo kuti amalize.

Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kutuluka?
Nenani kuti mutha kugwiritsa ntchito Telegalamu pazipangizo zanu kamodzi.
Kumbukirani, kutulukira kunja kumapha zakukhosi kwanu.
Kodi muli otsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa kukhudzana?
Pepani, simungakhoze kuwonjezera munthu uyu monga admin chifukwa iwo ali olemba mndandanda ndipo simungathe kuwagwirizanitsa.
MMM dd yyyy, h: mm a
Onetsani mbiri yanu muzithunzi za gulu

Winawake amene ali ndi nambala ya foni yanu!! [%1$s adafuna kuchotsa akaunti yanu ya Telegram ndikubwezeretsani mawu anu otsimikiziridwa awiri. Kana ichi sichinali, chonde lowetsani code ife tangokutumizani kudzera mwa SMS ku nambala yanu.
Khadi yanu%1$s ili pa fayilo. Kuti mulipirire ndi khadi ili, chonde lowetsani chinsinsi chanu chotsimikiziridwa-2.
Mutha kutaya mauthenga onse mu gulu ili.

Ngati mutayika timer, chithunzichi chidzadziwonongeka mutatha kuziwona.

Chithunzichi ndi malembawa adachokera ku makina obisika kuti akambirane chinsinsi ndi %1$s . Ngati iwo akuyang\'ana chimodzimodzi pa %2$s \\ s chipangizo, kumapeto kwa mapeto kulimbidwa. Phunzirani zambiri pa telegalamu .org
Mukhoza kuwonjezera mizere ingapo. Aliyense amene atsegula mbiri yanu adzawona lembalo.
Ena masikisi anu achikulire amawasungira kuti asungidwe. Mukhoza kuwathandizanso pa Masks Settings.
Othandizira anu onse a Telegram adzalandira nambala yanu yatsopano ku bukhu lawo la adiresi, ngati atakhala ndi nambala yanu yakale ndipo simunawalembe mu Telegalamu.
Mudzawona chithunzi chachinsinsi pa tsamba lazokambirana. Dinani kuti mutseke pulogalamu yanu ya Telegram ndi passcode yanu yatsopano.
Gawani ma fayilo ndi malemba muzokambiranazi ndi kuzipeza pazinthu zanu zonse.
Mutha kutaya mauthenga anu onse ndi mauthenga, pamodzi ndi mauthenga onse ndi mafayilo omwe mudagawana nawo, ngati mupitiriza kukhazikitsa akaunti yanu.
Chonde tumizani imelo ku sms@stel.com ndipo mutiuze za vuto lanu.
Pepani, mwachotsa ndikukonzanso kachiwiri akaunti yanu posachedwa. Chonde dikirani masiku angapo musanayambe kulembanso.
Ngati emoji pawindo la%1$s \'s yemweyo, kuyitana uku ndikutetezedwa ndi 100 %%.

Chatsopano mu version 4.2.1.1
- Tumizani zithunzi ndi mavidiyo omwe akuwonongeko mauthenga amodzi ndi amodzi (gwiritsani ntchito chiwonetsero cha ola limodzi mu chojambulira nkhani kuti muike timer).
- Sungani zithunzi ngakhale mwamsanga ndi makina ojambula zithunzi. Yonjezerani zosowa zanu (mu Mapangidwe) kuti anthu ammudzi akambirane kuti ndinu ndani.
- Imwani makanema ochokera m\'mabwalo akuluakulu a anthu mofulumira chifukwa cha CDN zatsopano.
- Mukasankha choyimitsa, pirani batani"mmwamba" mu gulu lazitali kuti mulowetse mpaka kuwonekera.
- Wowonjezera mod (P2.25) kuti asonyeze zogwiritsa ntchito pazithunzi za mauthenga
- Zokonza zamakono.
Bisani nambala yafoni kuchokera ku menyu
Popeza kuti akaunti %1$s ikugwira ntchito ndi kutetezedwa ndi mawu achinsinsi, tidzathetsa pa sabata imodzi kuti tipeze chitetezo. Ukhoza kuletsa ndondomeko iyi nthawi iliyonse.
Aliyense amene ali ndi Telegram adayikidwa adzatha kujowina njira yanu potsatira izi.
Pemphani Ogwiritsa Ntchito Pogwiritsa Ntchito Chizindikiro
Chiwerengero cha%1$s chatsumikizidwa kale ku akaunti ya Telegram. Chonde tulani akauntiyo musanayambe kupita ku nambala yatsopano.

Ngati athandizidwa, mungatenge zojambulajambula za pulogalamuyo, koma dongosololo liwonetseratu mazokambirana anu mu kusintha kwadongosolo ngakhale pamene passcode ikupita.
Mwina mungafunike kuyambanso pulogalamu kuti izi zitheke.
Gawani mavidiyo ndi mavidiyo muzokambiranazi ndikuzipeza pazinthu zanu zonse.
Mukhoza kukhazikitsa mawu achinsinsi omwe mungafunike mutalowa mu chipangizo chatsopano kuphatikiza pa code yomwe mumalandira mu SMS.
Sinthani yemwe angakuwonjezereni ku magulu ndi njira.

Chofunika: iwe sutha kuwona Nthawi Zowoneratu za anthu omwe simunawagawire nthawi Yanu Yomaliza. Zomwe zawonetsedwa potsiriza zidzawonetsedwa m\'malo mwake (posachedwa, pasanathe sabata, mkati mwa mwezi).

Mukakhazikitsa chiphaso chowonjezera, chizindikiro chotsekera chidzawonekera pa tsamba lazokambirana. Lembani kuti mutseke ndi kutsegula pulogalamu yanu ya Telegram.

Chonde dziwani kuti mabomba apakati amaperekedwa ndi omanga chipani chachitatu. Kwa botolo kuntchito, zizindikiro zomwe mumazijambula pambuyo pa dzina la mtumiaji wa bots amatumizidwa kwa woyimanga.
